eu.esu.mobilecontrol2.sdk

Class ThrottleScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.esu.mobilecontrol2.sdk.ThrottleScale

  • public class ThrottleScale
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to convert throttle positions to steps and vice versa.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThrottleScale(int zeroOffset, int stepCount)
      Creates a new ThrottleScale instance.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the current number of steps.
      int positionToStep(int position)
      Returns the corresponding step of a throttle position.

      Returns the corresponding throttle position of a step.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThrottleScale

        public ThrottleScale(int zeroOffset,
                     int stepCount)
        Creates a new ThrottleScale instance.

        Positions between 0 and zeroOffset will return 0. Use zeroOffset to avoid unwanted.

        Parameters:
        zeroOffset - The last position of the zero range.
        stepCount - The number of steps including zero. Must be lower than (255 - zeroOffset).

    • Method Detail

      • stepToPosition

        public int stepToPosition(int step)
        Returns the corresponding throttle position of a step.
        Parameters:
        step - The step.
        Returns:
        The throttle position.

        public int positionToStep(int position)
        Returns the corresponding step of a throttle position.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getStepCount

        public int getStepCount()
        Returns the current number of steps.
